record.jsxtip: Fires after the user hovers the mouse over this chart component and before the spyglass displays. The event script must evaluate to the HTML content to display in the spyglass. Canceling this event prevents the spyglass from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this chart component and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this chart component is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this chart component before it is removed from the DOM.
